about_the_game:
Each level in Slidezzle presents a unique challenge that requires players to think carefully and plan their moves to achieve the final goal. Your task is to move the colored blocks to their designated tiles by sliding them in the same direction at the same time.



Some blocks are there just to assist other blocks, making the puzzles require precise strategy and planning. Use these blocks wisely to solve each puzzle.



The game is designed to be played without any pressure or stress. There are no ads, no time limits, and no scores. If you get stuck, don’t worry! You can press the "Replay" button and try again.

With 72 hand-crafted puzzles, each designed to make you think and appreciate the beauty of the system, every level introduces a new idea with no filler.

Playable With Mouse Or Keyboard.
